name: .DVF File Extension
summary: Learn about .DVF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Compressed audio file format used by Sony's IC digital audio recorders, such as the ICD-BP100 and ICD-BP150; saved in a proprietary audio format that is only recognized by Sony software.

content: DVF files can be converted to a standard .WAV format using the Sony Digital Voice Editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Windows Media Player with Sony Player plugin
